refnamediv.refpurpose: converts one file format to another

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: cdk-fileconvert reads a input file and converts it to a new file with an other format. Supported input formats are CML, MDL Molfile, PDB and XYZ. Supported output formats are CML and MDL Molfile.
